## Practical Tips

We also maintain documentation with general practical and technical
tips. It varies from fixing specific Powershell errors to a full
explanation on how to do proper version control of both your data and
scripts with Git and DVC.

[iMOD Practical
tips](https://deltares.gitlab.io/imod/imod-practical-tips/)
